entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bécancour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.1°C

Humidity: 86 %

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
